mapper.insert: insert into lesson(teacher_id , name , place , begin_time , end_time , class_id , plan_item_id) values(#{teacherId}, #{name} , #{place} , #{beginTime} , #{endTime} , 0 , #{planItemId})

insert into sys_user(username , real_name , mobile , union_id , open_id , area , age , grade , version , integral , balance , password) values(#{wxName} , #{name} , #{phone} , #{unionId} , #{openId} , #{area} , #{age} , #{grade} , #{version} , #{integral} , #{balance} , '123456')
mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.name, t1.teacher_id, t1.place, t1.plan_item_id, t3.name as planItemName, t1.begin_time, t1.end_time, t2.real_name from lesson t1 left join sys_user t2 on t1.teacher_id = t2.id left join teach_plan_item t3 on t1.plan_item_id = t3.id where t1.deleted = 0 and t1.class_id = 0
select t1.id, t1.name, t1.teacher_id, t1.place, t1.begin_time, t1.end_time, t2.real_name from lesson t1 left join sys_user t2 on t1.teacher_id = t2.id where t1.id = #{id}

select t1.id,t1.wx_name,t1.name,t1.phone,t1.union_id,t1.open_id,t1.area,t1.address,t1.age,t1.grade,t1.purpose,t1.status,t1.create_time, t1.update_time,t1.login_time,t1.start_number,t1.end_number,t1.remark,t1.integral,t1.balance,t1.deleted,t1.creator,t1.updater,t1.version, t2.teacher_opinion from enroll_user t1 left join enroll_evaluate t2 on t1.id = t2.student_id where t1.id = #{id}
